Achievements.Title: Let's Get Started
Achievements.Description: Watch the introductionary movie.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Medicine Man
Achievements.Description: Acquire and deliver the KANPOU to Bunzo.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Ultimate Happiness
Achievements.Description: Get the girl. Drinks are on Bunzo.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Forever Drifting
Achievements.Description: Rejection is the one constant of human experience.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Best Punch Line
Achievements.Description: Max out the punch stat (127, item bonuses don't count).
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Professional Butt Kicker
Achievements.Description: Max out the kick stat (127, item bonuses don't count).
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Miyamoto Musashi
Achievements.Description: Max out the weapon stat (127, item bonuses don't count).
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: 105 mph Fastball
Achievements.Description: Max out the throw stat (127, item bonuses don't count).
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Run Like the Wind
Achievements.Description: Max out the agility stat (127, item bonuses don't count).
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: I Think I Can, I Think I Can...
Achievements.Description: Max out the willpower stat (127, item bonuses don't count).
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Unbreakable
Achievements.Description: Max out the defense stat (127, item bonuses don't count).
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Master Deflector
Achievements.Description: Max out the strength stat (127, item bonuses don't count).
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Presidential Fitness Award
Achievements.Description: Max out the stamina stat (255, item bonuses don't count).
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Bottomless Reserves
Achievements.Description: Max out the vitality stat (255, item bonuses don't count).
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: I Call Him Stabby
Achievements.Description: You are one with your prized dagger.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Bamboozle
Achievements.Description: Bamboo is technically just grass, but it's your grass.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Everybody Must Get Stoned
Achievements.Description: The thought of dropping your precious stone scares you.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Million Dollar Idea
Achievements.Description: This is your pet rock, none shall take him from you.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Completely Stumped
Achievements.Description: Fight back with nature.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: A Hard Lesson
Achievements.Description: Scrolls contain knowledge and knowledge is power. Don't lose yours.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Buck It
Achievements.Description: You've grown quite attached to this bucket. Don't lose it!
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Rickshaw Driver
Achievements.Description: Make a killing out of your living.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Frat Guys
Achievements.Description: Defeat Ashi, Ben, Hide, Hira, Moemo, Mura, Sada, Saita, Seki, Yotsu and their leader Gonsa.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Generic Dudes
Achievements.Description: Defeat Itoki, Hagi, Hansu, Hashi, Koue, Kosu, Saixu, Saki, Tamo, Yuki and their leader Ginpa.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Benny and Clyde
Achievements.Description: Defeat Chie, Isoro, Kuma, Onoki, Rihei, Tata, Tomo, Urae, Yata, Wata and their leaders Ichi and Roku.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Jets
Achievements.Description: Defeat Dezou, Hachi, Kumi, Rihe, Shima, Suya, Taro, Tero, Urasa, Yone and their leader Kinsu.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Home Boys
Achievements.Description: Defeat Bobu, Kisu, Kouki, Nori, Sahei, Suema, Take, Umema, Yoshi, Yuue and their leader Tame.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Jocks
Achievements.Description: Defeat Gensu, Hemo, Hisa, Kame, Mune, Oisa, Shin, Sumi, Taki, Yota and their leader Heiru.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Oko Yono
Achievements.Description: Defeat Yono.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Sharks
Achievements.Description: Defeat Akizo, Ineta, Ishi, Jmgq, Junzo, Mori, Saku, Shiba, Shiro, Uraji and their leader Heisi.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Hurricanes
Achievements.Description: Defeat Atsu, Chiji, Ebino, Gosu, Kana, Shuu, Suke, Sute, Tsuno, Yuri and their leader Jinro.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Cowboys
Achievements.Description: Defeat Gosa, Katsu, Kengo, Kiku, Mansi, Obisa, Sono, Toshi, Tsuki, Yasu and their leader Han.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Mob
Achievements.Description: Defeat Ingo, Mochi, Mohe, Neha, Omeno, Shou, Some, Tema, Toube, Zene and their leader Yago.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Squids
Achievements.Description: Defeat Goro, Inosu, Kamo, Kota, Mango, Mata, Tsuda, Uki, Umeta, Usuke and their leader Nizae.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Dragon Twins
Achievements.Description: Defeat Home, Kichi, Kuro, Nenki, Neto, Senbe, Senpa, Tago, Taha, Teha and their leaders Tatsu and Tsui.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Internationals
Achievements.Description: Defeat Heko, Keta, Kunki, Manpe, Masu, Mataa, Mehei, Momo, Tane, Unji and the traitor Tsuu.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Plague
Achievements.Description: Defeat Fune, Ihoma, Kansu, Kanta, Kome, Mino, Rohei, Sichi, Suji and Ushi.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: The Black Plague
Achievements.Description: Defeat The Plague a second time, including their leader Tora.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Grand Finale
Achievements.Description: Defeat The Plague for a third and final time, including their leader Asaji.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Reasonable Roller
Achievements.Description: Win three bets in a row.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Paying for Hope
Achievements.Description: Using the third option, win 4000 in a single bet.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Fully Equipped
Achievements.Description: Equip an item in every item slot.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: High Fashion
Achievements.Description: Obtain and equip MASTER shades.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Work Smarter, Not Harder
Achievements.Description: Obtain and equip MAP CRSR.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Make it Rain
Achievements.Description: Obtain and use GOODTIME.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Tech School
Achievements.Description: Obtain and activate M.FIST, M.KICK, M.WPN, M.FUMI, SCREW, N.ATTACK, and H.GUARD.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Certified Technician
Achievements.Description: Obtain and activate M.FISTII, M.KICKII, SCREWII, MASSAGE, WARPSHOT, DEFLECT, and M.KIUKIU.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Super Technical
Achievements.Description: Obtain and activate BIGBANG or BMPKNART (on Kunio).
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Hot Stuff
Achievements.Description: Defeat a gang's leader by throwing them into the center pit of the lava fields west of Rikuchuu.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Circus Performer
Achievements.Description: Keep a singular boss rolling or airborne for at least 10 seconds.
Achievements.Author: revixter

Achievements.Title: Heavy-handed
Achievements.Description: Defeat an entire gang with each hit doing 100 or more damage (this applies to your ally).
Achievements.Author: revixter
